name: Carcass ONE
description:
Carcass ONE is a mix of board game Carcassonne , puzzle, tetris and much more!

Carcass ONE is a simple singleplayer game, where you does not play against computer.

Features:
- Main game, where your goal is to reach the highest score as you can
- send hi-score and compare with others
- Adventure mod where your goal is different in every level

Game is under development, but playable.
If you find any bug, have some idea or something else please contact me : 3dolomouc@gmail.com
